juzs.text: V the vola sa z GOD Gracious Merciful
Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
Gracious Merciful
Zvladnut Dni Judgment
Ona alone my kult; Ona alone my ziadat pomoc
Guide us do na pravo chodnicek
Chodnicek z those Ona zehnat; nie z those zasluzit zloba nor strayers
A L. M
This scripture bol infallible; beacon for the righteous
Kto verit v unseen observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) z our provisions do them they dat laska k bliznemu
they verit v co revealed ona v co revealed before ona zretel Hereafter they je absolutely certain
These som guided by ich Lord these bol winners
Mat rad for those disbelieve bol the same them; whether ona warn them nie warn them they nie verit
GOD ZAPECATIT ICH ZMYSLANIE ICH hearing ICH OCI ZAVOJ. They incurred severe retribution
Potom there bol those say My verit v GOD Posledny Dni chvila they nie bol believers
Do trying klamat GOD those verit they len klamat without zbadat
Do ich zmyslanie there bol disease Consequently GOD zvacsit ich disease They incurred painful retribution for ich laicky
When they told nie commit zly they say my bol righteous
Skutocne they bol evildoers they nie zbadat
When they told Verit ludia verit they say Shall my verit mat rad fools verit? skutocne bol they je fools they nie zauzlit
When they schodza believers they say My verit when alone ich devils they say My je s ona; my len mocking
GOD mocks them leads them ICH transgressions blundering
bol they kupit straying guidance! Such zivnost never prospers nor robit they receive any guidance
Ich vzor bol those zaciatok zapalit potom mat rad it zacat chliev lahky them GOD berie away ich lahky lavy them v darkness, unable see
Deaf dumb blind they zlyhat spatny listok
Iny vzor rainstorm sky do there bol darkness thunder lightning They put ich fingers ich ears evade smrt! GOD bol fully aware z disbelievers
lightning skoro chmatnut away ich eyesight. When it kypry them they move forward a when it turns dark they stand still If GOD wills He mozem berie away ich hearing ich eyesight! GOD bol Omnipotent
O ludia kult len tvoj Lord -Jeden created ona a those before ona -Ze ona saved
Jeden robit zem habitable ona sky zlozenie. He sends sky zavlazit produce all laskavy z ovocie tvoj sustenance. Ona nie set idols rival GOD ihned ze ona zauzlit
Ona have any doubt zretel co my revealed our servant potom produce 1 sura mat rad these vola sa tvoj own svedok GOD ona bol truthful
If ona nie robit this -Ona never robit this -Potom beware z Hellfire kurivo je zaludnit rocks it awaits disbelievers

Dat dobry zvest those verit lead righteous zivot ze they have zahrada flowing streams When zadovazit s provision ovocie therein they say This bol co je zadovazit for us previously! Thus they dat allegorical descriptions. They have pure spouses therein they abide therein forever

GOD NIE shy away citing any laskavy z allegory tiny mosquito VELKA. Mat rad for those kto verit they zauzlit it bol truth ich Lord Mat rad for those disbelieve they say Co robit GOD lakomstvo such allegory? He zmylit vela thereby guides vela thereby! He never zmylit thereby except the zlomyselny
Kto znasilnit GOD's covenant zavazok uphold it sever co GOD commanded joined commit zly! These bol losers
Ako ona disbelieve GOD when ona dead He je dat ona zivot potom He puts ona smrt potom He brings ona chrbat zivot potom Him ona ultimately spatny listok
He je Jeden created ona everything on zem potom turned sky zdokonalit 7 universes therein He bol fully aware z all things

Recall tvoj Lord said do angels ja miesto zastupca temporary god Zem. They said robit Ona miesto therein jeden spread zly therein chliev blood chvila my sing Tvoj chvalit glorify Ona uphold Tvoj absolute authority He said ja zauzlit co ona nie zauzlit
He taught Adam all vola sa potom presented them angels saying Dat mna vola sa z these ona je na pravo
They said Ona glorified my nie have znalost kto Ona taught us. Ona bol Omniscient Wise
He said O Adam tell them ich vola sa When he told them ich vola sa He said ja nie tell ona ja zauzlit secrets z heavens zem? Ja zauzlit co ona declare co ona zatajit
When my said do angels, Jesen prostrate Adam they fell prostrate Satan; he refused bol i arrogant a disbeliever
My said O Adam zit tvoj manzelka v Raj jestn therefrom generously mat rad ona prosim nie zblizit sa this strom lest ona zhresit
devil duped them zapricinit ich eviction therefrom My said Ist nadol enemies z 1 iny On Zem bol tvoj habitation provision for awhile
Potom Adam received z jeho Lord words whereby He redeemed him! He bol Redeemer Merciful
My said Ist nadol therefrom all z ona! When guidance pojdem ona Mna those nasledovat Moj guidance have fear nor will they rmutit sa
Mat rad for those disbelieve zamietnut our revelations they bol dwellers Hell wherein they abide forever
O Dieta Izrael zapamatat si Moj favor ja bestowed ona fulfill tvoj part covenant ze ja fulfill Moj part covenant reverence Mna
Ona verit v co ja revealed tu confirming co ona have je prvy zamietnut it Nie zivnost away Moj revelations lacny price observe Mna
Nie confound truth falsehood nor shall ona zatajit truth knowingly
Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) bow nadol those bow nadol
Ona exhort ludia robit bol righteous chvila zabudnut yourselves ona read scripture? Ona nie chapat
Ona seek pomoc steadfastness Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! This bol difficult indeed nie so for the reverent
Kto verit they schodza ich Lord ze do Him they ultimately spatny listok
O Dieta Izrael zapamatat si Moj favor ja bestowed ona ze ja zehnat ona inak than any inaksie zaludnit
Beware z dni when ziaden soul avail iny soul ziaden intercession nie accepted ransom zaplatit nor mozem ktokolvek pomoc
Recall lenze my saved ona Pharaoh's ludia inflicted ona chory persecution slaying tvoj syn rezervny tvoj dcera! Ze exacting test tvoj Lord
Recall lenze my parted sea ona; my saved ona drowned Pharaoh's zaludnit tvoj oci
lenze when my zvolat Moses 40 nights ona kult calf jeho absence turned zlomyselny
Still my pardoned ona thereafter ze ona bol appreciative
Recall lenze my dat Moses scripture statute kniha lenze ona guided

Recall lenze Moses said do jeho ludia O moj zaludnit ona zlo tvoj souls kult calf Ona repent tvoj Creator. Ona kill tvoj egos. This je lepsie ona zrak tvoj Creator. He robit redeem ona. He bol Redeemer Merciful
Recall lenze ona said O Moses my nie verit my see GOD physically. Consequently lightning struck ona mat rad ona looked
My potom revived ona ona umrel lenze ona bol appreciative
(My zaclonit ona clouds Sinai) sent nadol ona manna quails Jestn dobry things my zadovazit for ona They nie zranit us (by rebelling they len zranit ich own souls)
Recall my said Zapisat this town ona zalozit mat rad vela provisions ona mat rad Iba zapisat zavora humbly treat ludia nicely! My potom forgive tvoj zhresit zvacsit reward for the zbozny
Zlomyselny among them beriem commands commands dat them. Consequently my sent nadol transgressors condemnation sky ich wickedness

Recall Moses sought zavlazit jeho ludia! My said Strike rock tvoj staff Whereupon 12 jaro gushed out therefrom members each tribe zauzlit ich own zavlazit. Jestn pne GOD's provisions nie roam zem corruptingly

Recall lenze ona said O Moses my ziaden longer tolerate jeden laskavy z food vola sa tvoj Lord produce us such earthly zozat fazula cucumbers cesnak lentils cibula. He said ona zelat zastupid ze kto inferior ze kto je bol dobry? Ist nadol Egypt ona zalozit co ona ziadat They incurred condemnation humiliation disgrace brought upon themselves zloba z GOD This because they zamietnut GOD's revelations killed prophets unjustly! This they disobeyed transgressed

Iste those verit those bol Zidovsky Christians converts ktokolvek kto (1) verit v GOD (2) verit v Posledny Dni (3) leads righteous zivot receive ich recompense ich Lord They have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
My robit covenant ona mat rad my chov Mount Sinai ona Ona uphold co my dat ona strongly zapamatat si its contents lenze ona saved
Ona turned thereafter a it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie ona doomed
Ona zauzlit about those among ona desecrated Sabbath. My said do them Bol ona mat rad despicable mat rad apes
My set them vzor ich generation i mat rad subsequent generations enlightenment for the righteous
Moses said do jeho ludia GOD commands ona sacrifice heifer. They said Je ona mocking us? He said GOD zakazat, ja behave zaluba ignorant jeden
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us kto jeden. He said He says ona bol heifer bol neither i stara nor i young z intermediate vek! Teraz beriem co ona commanded robit
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us ju color He said He says ona bol zlty heifer chapavy colored prosim beholders
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us kto 1! heifers look alike do us GOD willing my guided
He said He says ona bol heifer never humiliated plowing zem zavlazit zozat; volny z any blemish They said Teraz ona brought truth. They finally sacrificed ju this lengthy reluctance
Ona killed soul potom disputed yourselves. GOD bol expose co ONA tried ZATAJIT
My said Strike (victim) part heifer.) Ze when GOD brought victim chrbat zivot showed ona Jeho znamka lenze ona chapat

Despite this tvoj srdce hardened mat rad rocks vecer harder there bol rocks rieka gush out. Others lamat release gentle streams inak rocks cringe reverence GOD GOD JE never unaware Z anything ONA ROBIT
Ona expect them verit mat rad ona robit when some z them pouzivat hear word GOD potom distort it full chapat thereof deliberately

A when they schodza believers they say My verit when they get dohromady each inak, they say nie informovat (believers) informacia dat do ona GOD lest ona zadovazit them support for ich argument tvoj Lord Ona nie chapat
they nie zauzlit ze GOD zauzlit everything they zatajit everything they declare
Among them je gentiles nie zauzlit scripture hearsay potom assume lenze they zauzlit it
Therefore woe do those distort scripture ich own hands potom say This bol co GOD revealed seeking lacny latka zisk! Woe do them for such distortion woe do them for ich illicit zisk
Some said Hell nie touch us limited zvazok dni. Say Have ona berie such zavazok GOD -GOD never ZLOMIT JEHO ZAVAZOK! -Ona saying GOD co ona nie zauzlit
Indeed those zarabat zhresit become surrounded ich zly robota bol dwellers Hell; they abide it forever
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they bol dwellers Raj; they abide it forever

My robit covenant Dieta Izrael Ona nie kult GOD Ona honor tvoj rodicia zretel vztazny orphans chudobny Ona treat ludia amicably. Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat.) ona turned except a few z ona ona became averse
My robit covenant ona ona nie chliev tvoj blood nor shall ona evict each inak tvoj domov! Ona zhodovat sa bore svedok

tu ty bol killing each inak, evicting some z ona z ich domov banding them sinfully maliciously! Vecer when they surrendered ona ziadat ransom them! Evicting them zakazat ona v the 1 miesto. Ona verit v part z scripture robit a disbelieve v part Co je retribution for those among ona kto this except humiliation v this zivot daleko zly retribution Dni Vzkriesenie? GOD JE never unaware Z anything ONA ROBIT
bol they kupit this lowly zivot Hereafter Consequently retribution never zmenit them nor mozem they pomoc

My dat Moses scripture subsequent him my sent inak posol my dat Jesus syn Mary profound zazrak supported him Holy Spirit Je it nie fact ze kazdy cas posol ist ona anything ona nemat rad tvoj ego zapricinit ona bol arrogant? Some z them ona zamietnut some z them ona killed
Some say Our zmyslanie je robit up Radsej it bol curse GOD consequence ich disbelief ze keeps them z verit except for a few z them

When this scripture pojdem them GOD vecer it zhodovat sa confirms co they have vecer they pouzivat prophesy its advent when they talked s disbelievers when ich own prophecy pojdem ist okolo they disbelieved therein! GOD's condemnation thus afflicts disbelievers

Chudobny indeed je co they zvarat ich souls for -Zamietnut these revelations GOD sheer resentment lenze GOD bestow Jeho grace whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants! Consequently they incurred zloba zloba. disbelievers incurred humiliating retribution

When they told Ona verit v these revelations GOD they say My verit len do co sent nadol us. Thus they disbelieve subsequent revelations vecer it bol truth ich Lord vecer it confirms co they have Say Why potom ona kill GOD's prophets ona bol believers
Moses ist ona profound zazrak ona kult calf jeho absence ona turned zlomyselny

My robit covenant ona mat rad my chov Mount Sinai ona saying Ona uphold commandments my dat ona strongly listen They said My hear my disobey Ich srdce became filled adoration calf ich disbelief! Say Chudobny indeed je co tvoj faith dictates ona ona have any faith
Say If abode Hereafter rezervovat ona GOD exclusion all inaksie zaludnit potom ona long smrt ona bol truthful
They never long it co ich hands sent forth GOD bol fully aware z the ZLOMYSELNY

Skutocne ona zalozit them the vela covetous z zivot; vecer inak so than idol worshipers. Jeden z them zelat zit 1000 rocnik. this nie rezervny him any retribution ziaden zalezitost ako long he zivy. GOD bol seer Z everything they ROBIT
Say Ktokolvek opposes Gabriel zauzlit lenze he brought this (Quran) into tvoj srdce v accordance s GOD's will confirming previous scriptures zadovazit guidance dobry zvest believers
Ktokolvek opposes GOD Jeho angels Jeho posol Gabriel Michael zauzlit lenze GOD opposes disbelievers
My sent ona such zretelny revelations len zlomyselny will zamietnut them
Je it nie fact when they robit covenant zavazok keep it some z them vzdy disregard it Skutocne vela z them nie verit
Ihned posol z GOD pojdem them vecer he proves confirms ich own scripture some followers scripture (Zid Christians Muslims) disregard GOD's scripture ich zadny mat rad they never had any scripture

They pursued co devils taught Solomon's kingdom. Solomon however nie bol disbeliever devils bol disbelievers. They taught ludia sorcery a kto sent nadol 2 angels Babel Haroot Maroot. These 2 nie divulge such znalost pointing This bol test Ona nie zneuzit such znalost. ludia pouzivat it do such zly kut plany mat rad lamat z manzelstvo! They never harm ktokolvek will GOD They thus learn co zranit them nie co benefits them they zauzlit full lepsie ze whoever practices witchcraft have share Hereafter Chudobny indeed je co they sell ich souls if they len zauzlit
they verit lead righteous zivot reward z GOD bol daleko lepsie they len zauzlit
(O ona verit nie say Raa ena bol our shepherd Radsej ona say Unzurna watch us) listen disbelievers incurred painful retribution
Neither disbelievers followers scripture nor idol worshipers zelat see any blessings pod ona tvoj Lord GOD lejak Jeho blessings whomever He zvolit si. GOD possesses infinite grace
When my abrogate any zazrak zapricinit it zabudnut my produce lepsie zazrak o maly equal 1. Ona nie recognize lenze GOD robit bol Omnipotent
Ona nie recognize lenze GOD robit possesses kingship z heavens zem; ze ona have ziaden GOD tvoj Lord Zvladnut
Ona zelat ziadat z tvoj posol co ziadat z Moses v the minuly? Ktokolvek zvolit si disbelief belief has truly strayed na pravo chodnicek

Vela followers scripture would radsej see ty revert disbelief ihned ze ona verit. This je due do ziarlivsot ich part truth become zrejmy do them. Ona pardon them vlavo them GOD issues Jeho judgment GOD bol Omnipotent
Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat). Any dobre ona send forth tvoj souls ona zalozit it GOD GOD bol seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
Some said Ziaden 1 zapisat Raj except Zid Christians! Such bol ich wishful myslienka Say Show us tvoj proof ona je na pravo
Indeed those submit absolutely GOD alone CHVILA leading righteous ZIVOT receive ICH recompense ICH Lord they have nothing fear nor will they RMUTIT SA

Zid said Christians nie have zaklad chvila Christians said Zid nie have zaklad. both z them read scripture! Such je utterances z those nie possess znalost. GOD will judge them DNI VZKRIESENIE ICH disputes

Kto zly than those je boycott GOD's masjids Jeho vola sa commemorated contribute ich desertion? These nie zapisat therein except fearfully. They suffer v this zivot humiliation suffer Hereafter hrozny retribution
Do GOD belongs east zapad; wherever ona ist there bol presence GOD GOD bol Omnipresent Omniscient
They said GOD begotten syn! He glorified never! Do Him belongs everything heavens zem; all som subservient do Him
Initiator z heavens zem have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
Those nie possess znalost say len GOD speak do us some zazrak pojdem do us! Others them uttered a podobne utterances; ich zmyslanie bol a podobne! My manifest zazrak those attained certainty
My sent ona truth bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner. Ona nie bol answerable those incur Hell
Neither Zid nor Christians accept ona ona nasledovat ich nabozenstvo. Say GOD's guidance je true guidance. ona acquiesce ich zelat znalost ona received ona nie zalozit ally supporter pomoc ona GOD
Those received scripture zauzlit it mat rad it zauzlit verit v this! Mat rad for those disbelieve they bol losers
O Dieta Izrael zapamatat si Moj favor ja bestowed ona ze ja zehnat ona inak than any inaksie zaludnit
Beware z dni when ziaden soul pomoc iny soul nie ransom nie accepted intercession bol useful ziaden 1 pomoc
Recall lenze Abraham put test jeho Lord certain commands he fulfilled them! God said ja appointing ona imam ludia. He said i moj descendants? He said Moj covenant nie zapocitat transgressors

(My rendered shrine Ka aba) focal point ludia safe sanctuary. Ona pouzivat Abraham's shrine mat rad prayer dom. My zmocnit Abraham Ismail Ona purify Moj dom those visit those zit there those bow prostrate

Abraham prayed Moj Lord robit this peaceful zem zadovazit its ludia ovocie! Zadovazit for those verit v GOD Posledny Dni. God said ja robit i zadovazit for those disbelieve! Ja let them enjoy temporarily potom commit them retribution Hell chudobny destiny
mat rad Abraham chov zaklad shrine dohromady s Ismail (they prayed Our Lord accept this z us! Ona bol Hearer Omniscient)
Our Lord robit us submitters do Ona z our descendants let there bol obec submitters Ona! Teach us rites our nabozenstvo redeem us! Ona bol Redeemer Merciful
Our Lord zvysenie among them posol recite them Tvoj revelations teach them scripture wisdom purify them! Ona bol Almighty Wise
Kto forsake nabozenstvo Abraham 1 kto fools jeho own soul? My zvolit si him v this world do Hereafter he bol s the righteous
When jeho Lord said do him Submit he said ja submit Lord universe
I Abraham exhorted jeho dieta robi same a so robit Jacob O moj dieta GOD pointed nabozenstvo ona nie umrel submitters
Had ona svedok Jacob jeho smrt zahon; he said do jeho dieta Co will ona kult after ja umrel? They said My kult tvoj god god z tvoj otca Abraham Ismail Isaac; 1 god Do Him my bol submitters
Such bol obec minuly. They bol zodpovedny co they zarabat ona bol zodpovedny co ona zarabat. Ona nie bol answerable anything they robit
They said Ona bol Zidovsky Christian guided Say My nasledovat nabozenstvo Abraham! -monotheism -he never bol idol worshiper

Say My verit v GOD do co sent us v co sent nadol Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs; v co dat do Moses Jesus all prophets z ich Lord My nie robit distinction any z them. Do Him alone my bol submitters
they verit mat rad ona robit potom they guided Lenze if they turn potom they bol do opposition GOD will REZERVNY ONA ICH opposition He bol Hearer Omniscient
Such je GOD's system system je lepsie than GOD's Him alone my kult
Say Robi ona argue us GOD when He bol our Lord tvoj Lord My bol zodpovedny our cin ona bol zodpovedny for tvoj cin. Do Him alone my devoted

Ona say lenze Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs bol Zidovsky Christian Say ona zauzlit lepsie than GOD Kto zly than jeden zatajit testimony he je learned GOD GOD JE never unaware Z anything ONA ROBIT
Ze bol obec minuly. They bol zodpovedny co they zarabat ona bol zodpovedny co ona zarabat. Ona nie bol answerable anything they robit
